recipe.name: Mixed Green Salad Mitzi
recipe.notes: There's a note on the bottom of the card that suggests one could use Del Monte sliced new potatoes in place of fresh-baked.

ingredient.ingredient_name: lettuce, different varieties - romaine, spinach + green Australian lettuce

recipe.preparation: Slice potatoes + marinate in Italian dressing for 10 minutes or up to 2 hours.  Combine salad greens with sliced ripe olives, 1-2 cup sliced mushrooms, 1/4 cup sliced green onions, 1/4 cup bacon bits.Dressing:  1 pkg good Seasons French dressing + Italian dressing drained from potatoes.
